titleStmt.title: Alotments of goods to be sold by the Company of Royal Adventures of England Trading into Africa, at the African House in Broadstreet: by the candle, on Thursday the 18th. of January 1665. at eight of the clock in the morning. The buyer to have the impost of what he exports.
titleStmt.author: Royal African Company.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
